title: The Takeover: A Stepbrother Romance
description: He was the stepbrother she's always wanted...Jordan Chase has worked hard to move up in the Vidal empire, the obvious choice to fill her stepfather's shoes when he's gone. But Tristan Vidal has other plans.Will Jordan give Tristan a run for his money when she meets her elusive stepbrother for the first time? Or will Tristan take what's rightfully his, and more...
author: Lisbeth Day
